# Check mkdir and rm operations.
#
# RUN: rm -f -r %T/test
# RUN: mkdir -p %T/test
# RUN: cd %T/test
# RUN: rm -rf test1
# RUN: mkdir test1
# RUN: cd test1
# RUN: rm -rf %T/test1 %T/test2 %T/test3
# RUN: mkdir -p %T/test1 %T/test2 %T/test3
# RUN: cd %T/test1
# RUN: cd %T/test2
# RUN: cd %T/test3

# Check diff operations.
#
# RUN: echo "hello" > %t
# RUN: echo "hello" > %t1
# RUN: diff %t %t1

# Check rm operations.
#
# RUN: rm -f %T/test/temp.txt
# RUN: rm -fr %T/test
# RUN: rm -f %T/test.txt
# RUN: rm -r -f %T/*
